Online Payments.content: Using your Bank of Maharashtra Internet Banking Account, you can pay your bills like Electricity, Telephone, Satellite Television, Mobile Phone etc. You can also pay your Insurance Premium, Credit Card Bills etc. Please visit the Online Shopping/Gifts Link.

questions.question: How to Pay?
questions.answer:
1. Visit the Billers website, go for online payment option.
  2. Select Mode of Payment as Internet Banking and then select Bank of Maharashtra from the list of the Banks.
  3. You will be redirected to Bank of Maharashtra Payment gateway.
  4. Give your credentials, enter your transaction password and confirm the transaction.

questions.question: MAHA FAST PAY
questions.answer: Instead of visiting every biller website, you can directly pay, UTILITY PAYMENTS/POSTPAID MOBILE/INSURANCE/LOAN PAYMENTS/SUBSCRIPTIONS/ DONATIONS etc. using your Bank of Maharashtra Internet Banking Account.

questions.question: How to Pay?
questions.answer:
1. Select your type of payment and provide the bill details.
  2. You will be redirected to Bank of Maharashtra Payment gateway.
  3. Give your credentials, enter your transaction password and confirm the transaction.
  4. Online Receipt will be generated.

questions.question: What is E-Payment?
questions.answer:
• E-Payment is Online payment of Tax using your BOM Account through Internet Banking using Mahaconnect User Id and Passwords.
  • Using E-Payment facility you can pay Service Tax, Excise Duty, Income Tax, TDS, TCS, Wealth Tax, Hotel receipt Tax etc.
  • E-Payment facility for Sales Tax (State of Maharashtra) and Customs Duty Payment will be started shortly.

questions.question: E-Payment Prerequisites
questions.answer:
• Customer should have BOM Internet Banking facility i.e. a user id and passwords issued by BOM to use Mahaconnect (Internet Banking) facility.
  • Customer must be registered with Tax authorities and should have a valid PAN/TAN (for Direct Taxes) or an Assessee Code issued by Excise Dept (for Indirect Taxes).

Maha E-Trade.content:
Online Share Trading

We bring you the comfort of Share Trading on mouse click (Online Share Trading), in association with M/s Religare Securities, Munoth Securities and Enam Securities, the leading Stockbrokers.

questions.question: Features
questions.answer:
1. Trading with the intention of delivery.
  2. Intra day Square off.
  3. Buy To-day and Sell on T1/ T2 day.
  4. Trade Multiple.

questions.question: Eligibility
questions.answer:
1. Individuals
  2. Trusts etc.
  3. Corporates

For Online Share Trading facility Client should have a Demat Account and a Banking Account (with Internet Banking facility) with Bank of Maharashtra and a Trading Account with one of the three broking firms (M/s Religare / M/s Munoth / M/s Enam).

NPS.content:
• NPS is a government-backed pension scheme in India aimed at encouraging individuals to save for retirement, offering a mix of equity, corporate bonds, and government securities for long-term wealth creation.
  • The e-NPS online portal allows individuals to register for a PRAN (Permanent Retirement Account Number) and start their pension account digitally with minimal paperwork.
  • Registered users can contribute directly to their NPS Tier I and Tier II accounts online, ensuring hassle-free pension fund management and tax-saving benefits.

Apply.content:
• The Public Provident Fund (PPF) provides a secure, tax-free savings option with long-term benefits.
  • Customers can conveniently track finances with email statements and stay informed about account activities through real-time SMS alerts.
  • Diversify investments with mutual funds tailored to your financial goals and securely manage securities using a Demat account.
  • Ensure financial protection with insurance products covering life, health, and assets.
  • Enjoy 24/7 access to internet banking for seamless transactions, and safeguard valuables using safe deposit lockers provided by banks.
  • Easily open a savings account online, complete the Re-KYC or avail doorstep banking. Complete the process securely from the convenience of your home.
  • Click to register for WhatsApp banking services from Bank of Maharashtra.
  • Apply for loans from Bank of Maharashtra at attractive interest rates.

Information.content:
• View and download important information on Terms and conditions of Internet banking and Mobile Banking, privacy policies, security tips, service charges.
  • Stay informed about the latest interest rates for investments like FDs and savings accounts.

Grievance redressal.content: • Register your payment related complaints with Bank.

Card Services.content:
• Easily apply for add-on cards for your family members through Internet Banking.
  • Manage your credit card online, including viewing statements, paying bills, and checking your rewards.
  • Customize your debit card with unique designs and enjoy convenient access to your funds.

Agri Services.content:
• Stay updated with current mandi prices in your region to make informed decisions on agricultural produce. Access real-time weather updates to plan farming activities efficiently.
  • Utilize a digital platform for seamless buying, selling, and trading of agricultural products and services.

Offers.content: • Checkout the offers on Card issued on RUPAY platform

Calendars and Downloads.content:
• View holiday calendars and stay updated with latest news and announcements from Bank.
  • Download application forms from Bank's official website.

Shopping.content: Compare & Shop is the one-stop shopping & cashback destination exclusively for Bank of Maharashtra customers powered by Cheggout Services Private Limited. Compare & Shop offers an in-house shopping platform built within the Bank’s digital channel. It helps users save on their everyday orders. Make the most of your shopping with exclusive offers and deals from your favourite brand.

questions.question: What we offer you?
questions.answer:
• Easy price comparison- Search what you wish to buy, we compare prices from multiple stores and list the best deals.
  • Grab your best buy and continue shopping!
  • Coupons & Deals- Get exclusive coupons & deals from your favourite brands and save instantly!
  • Cashback & Reward Points- Earn attractive cashbacks up to ?2000 for your orders via Compare & Shop.
  • Easy redemption- Redeem and transfer your earned cashback directly to your bank account.
  • Discount on vouchers & Gift Cards- Get instant discounts up to 15% on Gift Card orders from Compare & Shop.

BranchDetails.type: Contact Our Maha Secure Customer Care Helpdesk
Sales Tax Department - State of Maharashtra (ePayment of Taxes)
NSDL - National Securities Depository Limited (ePayment of Taxes)
CC Avenue - Avenues India Pvt Ltd (Online Shopping)
Bill Desk - IndiaIdeas.com Ltd (Online Utility Bill Payment)
